content:
# The Stone Furnace has now produced a total of 5 Iron Plates, with only 1 unit of Iron Ore remaining. 
# This indicates that the smelting process is nearing completion.

# I will wait a final time to allow the last unit of Iron Ore to be smelted into an Iron Plate.

sleep(5)  # Wait for another 5 seconds for the final Iron Ore to be smelted.
output_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Check the output inventory of the furnace one last time.
print(f"Final furnace output: {output_inventory}")  # Display the final output inventory of the furnace.
